name: Johnny Debt
description:
Johnny is poor, very poor. Lucky for him he’s got a silver tongue and morals questionable enough to swindle a town’s worth of people for every penny they have. With 100 dollars to his name he sets out to borrow his way to financial freedom…or plunge deeper and deeper into crippling debt.

How to Play

WASD to move and SPACEBAR to borrow/pay money.

Run around the town borrowing money from people to pay your bills (food, rent). Whenever you successfully pay someone back you’ll be able to borrow more money the next time - make sure you pay them back on time though! The aim of the game is to acquire the three houses then last as long as possible as you accrue more and more debt. 

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48, enjoy :)
